jobInfo.postDescription:
Main Responsibilities:

1. Offer continuous support to the Planning team wherever necessary.
2. Responsible for updating master plans on a regular basis.
3. Efficiently manage the approval process of the plan.
4. Start to build a good understanding of each client’s business.
5. Be aware of overall advertising objectives.
6. Develop in-depth knowledge of available Planning tools.
7. Provide assistance in the evaluation of media opportunities.
8. Develop knowledge of the different departments and their functions in the agency.
9. Responsible for collating tear sheets in order to process invoices for clients.
10. Continually think creatively and identify new, innovative opportunities that could be effectively used by clients.

Requirements:

1. Numeracy, literacy and accuracy.
2. Efficiency, proactive and take ownership of work.
3. Be able to process research data with relevant software/systems
4. Possess a basic knowledge of marketing functions and business environment.
5. Be fully conversant with the role within 1-2 years
Note: Full English interview
 
Redmill Solutions Ltd (RMS) is a privately owned company, registered and headquartered in the United Kingdom with offices in Greater London, UK and Guangzhou, China and a technology partner based in Minsk, Belarus. Redmill Solutions was founded in March 2010 with the sole objective to empower advertisers by providing complete visibility and transparency to their advertising data. Accessibility to useful data allows the advertiser to make cost effective choices while increased understanding and connectivity to local markets.
We are a small, rapidly growing media technology company and our client base includes Coty, Hershey’s, MasterCard, Mondelez, Reckitt Benckiser, J&J etc. We have several products that need constant development and new features being launched regularly. We are looking for a smart, ambitious developer with a strong sense of curiosity to learn to be the best programmer in the industry.

You will be able to work independently and enjoy the challenge of pushing technology to its boundaries.

You'll have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our products from the code and ideas you contribute.

You will be learning from people who act as influential advisers on projects for many of the world’s most successful companies
jobInfo.address: 广州天河区广东省广州市天河区冼村街道高德置地广场A座通用电气大厦

brandComInfo.introduce:
睿妙公司Redmill Solutions是一家专注于广告行业的商业解决方案提供商，成立于英国伦敦，在广州和土耳其有分公司。
我们的目标是让广告数据更加简单、透明和可视化，帮助我们的客户提高对全球广告市场的理解，加强各分公司的联系，更有效地做出抉择。
我们是一个发展迅速的广告技术公司，我们的主要客户来自于全球性的大企业，包括奥利奥、滴露、MasterCard、阿迪达斯和强生等品牌的母公司。随着产品升级、客户需求增加，我们正在寻找一些聪明好学的人加入我们一起奋斗。
Redmill Solutions Ltd (RMS) is a privately owned company, registered and headquartered in the United Kingdom with offices in Greater London, UK and Guangzhou, China and Turkey. Redmill Solutions was founded in March 2010 with the sole objective to empower advertisers by providing complete visibility and transparency to their advertising data. Accessibility to useful data allows the advertiser to make cost effective choices while increased understanding and connectivity to local markets.
We are a small, rapidly growing media technology company and our client base includes Coty, Hershey’s, MasterCard, Mondelez, Reckitt Benckiser, J&J etc. We have several products that need constant development and new features being launched regularly. We are looking for a smart, ambitious developer with a strong sense of curiosity to learn to be the best programmer in the industry.
You will be able to work independently and enjoy the challenge of pushing technology to its boundaries.
You’ll have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our products from the code and ideas you contribute.
You will be learning from people who act as influential advisers on projects for many of the world’s most successful companies.
